text: Koraa, ‘allahe nija bandasakalara babe yibora sobha-saundaryara bastu arau bisud'dha jiraika srsti karaiche seya kone nisid'dha karaiche’? Koraa, ‘parthira jiranata, bisesakai kiyamatara dina e'ibora te'omlokara babe, yisakale imana aniche’. E'idarae ami jnani sampradayara babe ayatasamuha bisadabharae bibrta karao
